0.post_text:
Hi guys, Thank You all for sharing our coffee passion and for your RSVPs for the Starbucks Christmas Blend coffee seminars. All spots have now been filled and we look forward to connecting with you over an amazing cup of coffee. 

For those who didn't manage to get a spot, we apologize and we hope to see you at our future events really soon!

comments.message: My Favorite is Toffee Nut Latte!
My no.1 fav fav fav toffee nut latte !!!!!!!! <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3
i get it every year... w/o fail. reminds me that Christmas is coming!
Love it too! But the East Coast Park branch was using Meiji low fat milk. Wasn't as good.  :\
This post just made me decide to get one today!
Please bring back Salted Caramel Mocha...I'm dying without it!!!!
Is it available in skinny version?
Hi Eveylyn, yes as with all our handcrafted beverages, you can choose to customize your drink with your preferred choice of milk, or ask for it without whipped cream!
wow Ling Donwei, you can customize your drink with low-fat milk! :-)

2.post_text: A flavorful holiday beverage, the Toffee Nut Latte combines the rich buttery flavor of sweet toffee with toasted nuts, blended with smooth espresso and velvety steamed milk. Top that goodness off with whipped cream and toffee-flavored sprinkles, it’s no surprise that this warm, heavenly beverage is sure to put you in the mood for Christmas, and the perfect mid-week pick-me-up we think!

comments.message: Will the same coffee blend be featured?
Email sent three times... Bounced back .... Is it correct ???
Jackyn Tee, try marketing@starbucks.com.sg  I think they wrote it as marketing@starbucks.com.sg. ending sg with a full stop (.) that's all.  Good luck!!

3.post_text:
Christmas wouldn't be the same at Starbucks if we didn't share our favorite Christmas traditions, especially the highly anticipated Starbucks® Christmas Blend, along with all the warm & wonderful stories that come with.
 
The Starbucks® Christmas Blend coffee seminar is a small, cozy session where our team of coffee masters share the Christmas Blend coffee story with you. There'll be tastings involved, as well as some food pairing to go along with the appreciation of the coffee! 
 
As promised, here are more slots for those who missed out on the first round of coffee seminars. Fastest fingers first! :) 
 
8 Nov (Thu)
·         12pm: Marina Square II (#03-217)
·         3pm: Tampines Mall
·         6pm: Changi City Point

10 Nov (Sat)
·         3pm: Rochester Mall

11 Nov (Sun)
·         3pm: Marina Square (#02-168)
·         6pm: Thomson Plaza

17 Nov (Sat)
·         3pm: Delfi Orchard
 
Rsvp to marketing@starbucks.com.sg. Spots are limited. Each session lasts an hour.

comments.message: Listen friends...THIS IS ON MY WISH LIST!! :-D

Ur toffee nut latte is heavenly good...!
Cant wait for starbucks 12 days of xmas
Hi. What's this coffee seminar about?

Hi Reshmi, the coffee seminar is a time where coffee lovers get together, and our coffee masters share our favorite seasonal coffee with you through food pairings to enhance the coffee tasting experience.

5.post_text:
Hi guys, on behalf of everyone at Starbucks, we want to thank you all for your enthusiasm and strong support for our upcoming coffee seminars :)

We've officially filled up except the one at Marina Bay Link Mall.

For those who have yet to find a spot, seats are still available for:

2 November, Friday 
2:30pm Starbucks Marina Bay Link Mall 

Rsvp to marketing@starbucks.com.sg. Spots are limited. Each session lasts an hour. We'll see you there.

7.post_text:
Christmas wouldn’t be the same at Starbucks if we didn’t share our favorite Christmas traditions, especially the highly anticipated Starbucks® Christmas blend, along with all the warm & wonderful stories that come with. 
Join us in a coffee seminar happening over the first 3 weeks of November (we’re psyched! Hope you are too). 

Here’s a warm invite to our first few sessions: 

2 November, Friday 
2:30pm Starbucks Marina Bay Link Mall 
5:30pm Starbucks Equity Plaza 

3 November, Saturday 
3pm Starbucks Raffles City 

4 November, Sunday
12pm Starbucks North Point
5pm Starbucks East Point 
 
Will we see you there?
Rsvp to marketing@starbucks.com.sg. Spots are limited. Each session lasts an hour.

11.post_text: Christmas begins at Starbucks tomorrow. Rekindle the joy with us, we welcome you with delicious festive beverages and magical Christmas moments in our stores! :)

This beverage was the first drink that my fiancé ordered for me when he accompanied me to Starbucks to mug for my final test in the middle of the night last year. This time this year, we're getting married! :D (and definitely going back to that same branch for another peppermint mocha <3)

12.post_text: Peppermint Mocha needs little introduction. A warm combination of espresso, steamed milk, bittersweet chocolate and peppermint enriches the flavor of Christmas in our seasonal mainstay. Topped with classic whipped cream and a rich chocolate drizzle, this crowd-pleaser is 2 days away from returning to our stores - to some fanfare, we'd expect! :)

comments.message: Saw it at RC branch. Packing is really cute

13.post_text: 3 days till you bring one of our beloved coffees home. A new coffee for the season, our very unique Starbucks® Christmas Blend is roasted to Espresso Roast specifications for a perfectly festive Christmas espresso.

comments.message: Every year starbucks never fail to put me in a christmasy mood!

14.post_text: Tumblers, to-go mugs and ornaments have been lovingly repackaged to the tune of our favorite season. Come get 'em... in 4 days ;)

15.post_text: 5 days more till you cup a warm mug of Christmas in your hands with take-home packs: Starbucks® Christmas Blend - available in 250g Whole Bean or 50g pre-ground bags, and in Starbucks VIA® Ready Brew. Bring us closer to you. There really is no better way.

16.post_text: Our very adored Cranberry White Chocolate Mocha is 6 days away from your grasp. Luscious white chocolate and tart cranberry flavor is deliciously infused with espresso and velvety steamed milk. We can barely wait to serve them to you guys, too.

17.post_text: We know we are not alone in the excitement surrounding our well-loved Christmas drinks. To all the curious fans who have been telling us you miss your Toffee Nut Lattes, we hear you! Guess what? We’re 7 days away from having our full Christmas menu back in our stores. Get excited! *confetti*

18.post_text:
Need your caffeine fix? You’re not alone. Starbucks VIA® Ready Brew provides a gratifying fix wherever you go – expertly roasted, uniquely delicious perfection; in an instant. Joining the bandwagon of Starbucks VIA® is our Signature House Blend. Brewed from the finest Latin American beans, this medium-roasted coffee is balanced with smooth and rich flavors and is distinctive of our brand. 

On a side note, many coffee-lovers hold the misconception that medium blends are less rich and flavorful. 

Wanna know the truth? 
http://www.starbucks.com/coffee/medium/house-blend/via

Watch the video and find out the real difference between blonde, medium, and dark roasts.

19.post_text:
Autumn may not show itself in blankets of fallen leaves here in Singapore, but it sure feels like it this cool cloudy morning. Wind down, come in to our stores for a hot cuppa, and bask in the crisp flavour of a pretty autumn’s day. 
Happy Wednesday guys!

20.post_text: It’s Friday! While you let your hair down, allow your senses to indulge in our Salted Caramel Mocha Frappuccino® blended beverage - imagine the rich flavor of our toffee nut and mocha syrup, blending beautifully with Starbucks® Frappuccino® Roast coffee, milk, and ice. Mmmm... Finished with whipped cream, our delicious caramel drizzle and smoked sea salt, it’s the perfect cool perk-me-up, and coincides with the sound of freedom… (Yay weekends!) *a tall frap costs $6.60.

comments.message: Just one of this stuff, and what did I get? A sore throat and a cough the next day. Am I the only one here who experience this? (xD)
awwwwwww grrrr bring starbucks back to AUS!!!
I do not like Starbucks coffee.I prefer a cup of hainan kopi from the coffee shop.

21.post_text: Let’s warm up in the office with the rich flavors of Salted Caramel Mocha, your perfect companion in the cool office or chilly lecture hall. Experience an enveloping warmth with this creamy mix of espresso and velvety steamed milk, blended with mocha sauce and toffee nut flavored syrup. Topped with whipped cream, buttery caramel sauce and a mixture of turbinado sugar and smoked sea salt, this is your day, made.

23.post_text:
Hi everyone, the weekend is finally here! 

If you're looking for a cozy place to hang out with friends and catch up till late, or a place to wind down with your favorite warm beverage, our 24 hour stores are the perfect place. 

Located islandwide, such as at Bugis Junction, Cathay, Liat Towers, Northpoint, Tampines Mall (and more!), we’ll be brewing all night so do check out http://www.starbucks.com.sg/stores-24h.html to find your nearest 24 hour Starbucks store today.

24.post_text:
Curious to know what Autumn tastes like?

Starbucks Autumn Blend™ is one directive suggestion: A blend of coffees from Sumatra and the Antigua region of Guatemala. Expertly roasted to create a full-bodied brew with subtle spice and nuances of herbs, lemon, cedar and cocoa. 

This blend has the unique versatility to pair well with all your favorite tastes of autumn, whether sweet or savory.
